fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport
eu_initiatives: CELCAA is following free trade negotiations, in particular the EU - USA TTIP, implementation of EU - Canada CETA agreement, EU-Japan , EU-Mercosur etc. CELCAA is also following all regulatory development covering food, such as official controls; Food Information for Consumers. In addition, CELCAA is interested in Customs matters and transport and logistics issues.
organisation_name: European Liaison Committee for Agriculture and agri-food trade (celcaa)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

relevant_communication: CELCAA organises two to three annual events - conference, luncheons or round table- at European Parliament or elsewhere. Guests are from Commission, attachés, MEPs, stakeholders. All events are mentioned on the website.
goals__remit:
CELCAA is the European Umbrella representing the profession of trade in agri-commodities and agri-food products to the EU institutions, stakeholders and media.  
CELCAA acts as a platform of exchange between its members, and has the role to educate the EU decision-makers about the role of the trade in the economy.
